# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_SIREN

## Summary
Sets the vehicle siren

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** sirenFlag

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Activate siren on vehicle (Only works if the vehicle has a siren).
